institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 4 (Performance Work)
contents: Article 4 (Performance Tasks) ① The Corporation shall perform the following tasks necessary for the consortium project. 1. Work in accordance with Article 3 of the regulations, 2. Support for the joint training center for consortium projects, 3. Organization and operation of the deliberation committee, 4. Support for review and evaluation of the business plan of the joint training center, 5. Management of support funds for the joint training center Monitoring of use, 6. Selection and designation of the person responsible for accounting settlement of the joint training center, 7. Recovery or recovery of support funds due to cancellation of consortium selection of the joint training center, etc., 8. Approval of request for change in support funds by the joint training center, 9. Support and management of the hub business group, 10. Support for the joint training center council, 11. Hosting of the Best CHAMP competition (best practice competition), 12. Other work related to consortium business, ② The Corporation performs work pursuant to paragraph 1 Some of these can be delegated to branches or branches of the corporation. ③ In accordance with Article 6 of the Regulations, the Corporation shall establish a business plan for the consortium business for the following year and obtain approval from the Minister of Employment and Labor by the end of the relevant year.
